get.summary: Returns current version of API. You may use it as healthcheck
Get challenge amount by user id

post.summary: Make transfer of funds to another user
Make withdrawal of funds to external wallet

info.title: xRocket Pay API
info.description:
This API based on @xRocket (@ton_rocket_test_bot for testnest) Payment System. In order to use it, you need to get API key from bot. Open it and go to Rocket Pay > Create App > API token.

This page is fully interactive. Provide obtained API key to AUTHORIZE button on the right, and you can try all API methods by simply clicking buttons and filling forms here

API token must be specified in header of each request. Header name is Rocket-Pay-Key. Only exception is /version endpoint

If endpoint can send webhooks in response, it is provided on endpoint page on Callbacks bookmark. Now only /tg-invoices endpoint sends webhooks. You can turn them on in bot in app management page
In order to verify webhooks information integrity, we send you in headers parameter rocket-pay-signature, which is hex representation of HMAC-SHA-256 signature used to sign request body with a secret key that is SHA256 hash of your app token.

This specification fully complies with OpenAPI 3.0 standard, so if you want to see schemas of request bodies or responses, please click "Schema" inside endpoint. All mandatory fields marked with *, all types and limits also described inside schemas

Change Log

version 1.3

Added support for multi-invoices:
post /tg-invoices - added request parameter numPayments (default - 1), added response parameter totalActivations, activationsLeft
webhook /tg-invoices - added parameter payment (telegram user ID and number of items purchased for this payment)
get /tg-invoices - added response parameter totalActivations, activationsLeft
get /tg-invoices/{id} - added response parameter numPayments and payments (list, info about payments that were maid for this invoice)

version 1.3.1

Added support for multi-invoices with any amount and any payments number (you can put 0 to amount and numPayments)
get /tg-invoices/{id} - added to response payments object parameters: paid and payment amount
webhook /tg-invoices - added to payment object parameters: paid and payment amount

tags.name: multi-cheque
tags.description: Here you can save multi-cheque. Referral program also could be set. No additional fees taken.

tags.name: tg-invoices
tags.description:
Here you can save one-time invoices that can be payed via xRocket bot and get link for these invoices.
This endpoint sends updates to your webhook if it is enabled. You can find webhook model on Callbacks bookmark below
If you want to save invoices that can be payed only via attached address (no telegram access required), we will support it soon too

property.description: name of input field that cannot be processed

error.example: somePropertyName should be less than X

total.description: Total amount of cheque (this amount is charged from balance)

users.description: Number of users that can activate your cheque

sendNotifications.description: send notifications about cheque activation to application cheque webhook or not

refProgramPercents.description: percentage of cheque that rewarded for referral program

state.description: Active - cheque created and has unclaimed activations. Completed - cheque totally activated.

forPremium.description: Only users with Telegram Premium can activate this cheque

forNewUsersOnly.description: Only new users can activate this cheque

linkedWallet.description: Only users with connected wallets can activate this cheque
